name: From the Bottom
description:
From the Bottom is a Die and Retry game created approximately in 3 days for the HEAJ Game Jam 2023.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls (no gamepad support yet)  : 

move with directionals arrow

dash with left shift

jump with space

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Creators :

Hertzog WIlliam : Programmer, UI designer, Level designer

Rigaux Joël : Soud Designer, Illustrator

Droeven Arthur : Concept artist, Chara artist, Animator, Level designer

Luong Quoc An Sylvain : Concept artist, Chara artist, Animator
